attributes.description: MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252552. Vehicle comes with a balance of a 6YR/150000KM Warranty. The Nissan Almera, is a smart sedan that is comfortable, affordable, spacious and eco-friendly. The interior is designed for comfort. Plenty of room, with comfortable seating that’s designed to be relaxing, even on longer trips. Vehicle has very  low mileage and it is in good condition. It can be used as a family vehicle or for business purposes like shuttling perfect vehicle because you also wouldn't spend much on fuel the manufacturers claimed fuel consumption figures averages at 6.3 litres per 100 km.

The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Call us today on to arrange a test drive. Errors and omissions Reserved.
T&Cs apply
